version.description: A bunch of helpful lints to avoid common pitfalls in Rust.

projects.name: rust-lang-nursery/rust-clippy
projects.description: A bunch of lints to catch common mistakes and improve your Rust code. Book: https://doc.rust-lang.org/clippy/

check.name: Maintained

documentation.short: Determines if the project is "actively maintained".

check.reason: 30 commit(s) out of 30 and 8 issue activity out of 30 found in the last 90 days -- score normalized to 10

documentation.short: Determines if the project requires human code review before pull requests (aka merge requests) are merged.

check.reason: no effort to earn an OpenSSF best practices badge detected
